title: 393: Protein, Health & Longevity
description: Sal, Adam & Justin have repeatedly emphasized that consuming excessively large quantities of protein does not benefit performance and may in fact jeopardize health. However, there are times when more protein may be in order. Tune into this episode to learn why... Have Sal, Adam & Justin personally train you with a new video on our new YouTube channel, Mind Pump TV. Be sure to Subscribe for updates.
